jules.title: Remediation_TD116_117_118
jules.instruction:
Implement the core structural and economic integrity fixes for TD-116 (Inheritance Leaks), TD-117 (DTO-Only Decisions), and TD-118 (CommerceSystem Sequence Integration). 

Focus on exact inheritance distribution logic, refactoring make_decision to use Snapshot DTOs, and splitting CommerceSystem into Plan/Finalize phases within the 4-Phase Sacred Sequence.

git_review.instruction: Analyze this PR. Check behavior logic and test coverage.
